updated_cases.title: Validated block notification is sent properly when block_template has 0 size in tenant directory
updated_cases.custom_summary: Cancel button clicked by the user
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
1. stack should be up and running
2. client should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Steps:
1. Create empty block_page.html and block_page.json
2. create dlp block policy for upload of google gmail app
2. select default/custom tempalte in policy
3. login to gmail app
4. perform upload activity
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1.User justification page should popup and file should not get uploaded after clicking on cancel button 
2.Proper Cancel events should be generated in Skope IT 
3.Activity should be Upload
 4.Justification reason and justification type should be as empty string even you typed justification string or not in cancel event.
5.Cancel Event should contain policyname and referer name.

updated_cases.title: Validated user notification is sent properly when user_template has 0 size in tenant directory
updated_cases.custom_summary: Cancel button clicked by the user
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
1. stack should be up and running
2. client should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Steps:
1. Create empty file for userjustification tempalte
2. create user alert policy for upload of google gmail app
2. select default/custom tempalte in policy
3. login to gmail app
4. perform upload activity
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1.User justification page should popup and file should not get uploaded after clicking on cancel button 
2.Proper Cancel events should be generated in Skope IT 
3.Activity should be Upload
 4.Justification reason and justification type should be as empty string even you typed justification string or not in cancel event.
5.Cancel Event should contain policyname and referer name.

updated_cases.title: Validate Javascript on block notification page is not sent every 60 seconds if block button is not clicked
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate Javascript on block notification page is not sent every 60 seconds if block button is not clicked
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Created Block policy with few categories social, Gambling.

Set client notification to browser.

Open network location tools.

Access gambling.com, facebook.com

Getting browser based block notification.

Do not take any action.

Wait for 60 seconds.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
There is not retry seen from browser.

Also no duplicate event seen on SkopeIT page.
